TopicTitle: My idea for a couple simple tweaks.

Articles.Content:
I would like to see a few things either implemented or allow me to check a box to make them work.

1.  Please let us scroll through all of the parts in the VAB.  Under each tab there is 3 or 4 pages of stuff.  I'd love to be able to use my scroll wheel and move down the window instead of having to turn a page.  

2.  How about not having to click 4 times to exit the game?  An exit to windows button would be great.  Oh and quit with the "Really Quit" please.  I pushed exit game, I'm a big boy.  If I screwed up, I know where the icon is to relaunch it.  

Thanks Squad for an awesome game.
